text: Busy Philipps rang in her 39th birthday on Monday. But the day did not exactly go off without a hitch, as the Cougar Town scene - stealer shared with her fans on her Insta Stories. Looking disgruntled, Busy explained :'Guys, I had a hair dye mishap on my birthday. Accident. I used a new hair dye, and it's like bright fuscia. Oh, no!'Bit of a problem : Busy Philipps'39th birthday on Monday did not exactly go off without a hitch, as the Cougar Town scene - stealer shared with her fans on her Insta Stories Busy laughed weakly, captioning the video with white text on a red block reading :'Nothing is permanent!'The Illinois -
